title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
wers. Engage in combat and defeat him to continue.

Leave the Shadowfell

If you chose ending two, and Shadowheart spared the Nightsong, Nightsong will go after Ketheric Thorm. You need to leave Shadowfell to continue.

Shadowheart spared the Nightsong, in spite of Shar's demands that she be sacrificed. Shar will no doubt be furious, but the Nightsong seems to know something about Shadowheart's past. Whatever secrets she can reveal may be worth risking the wrath of a goddess.
